member.name: DEVELOPER_DRIVE_ENABLEMENT_STATE
member.summary: An enum of possible values for the developer drive enablement state.

member.name: DEVELOPER_DRIVE_ENABLEMENT_STATE.DeveloperDriveEnablementStateError
member.summary: Indicates that there was an error determining the developer drive enablement state. After this is returned, call to get the error value.

member.name: DEVELOPER_DRIVE_ENABLEMENT_STATE.DeveloperDriveEnabled
member.summary: Indicates that the developer drive is enabled.

member.name: DEVELOPER_DRIVE_ENABLEMENT_STATE.DeveloperDriveDisabledBySystemPolicy
member.summary: Indicates that the developer drive is disabled by system policy.

member.name: DEVELOPER_DRIVE_ENABLEMENT_STATE.DeveloperDriveDisabledByGroupPolicy
member.summary: Indicates that the developer drive is disabled by group policy.
